channel.title: Galactic archeology on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Galactic archeology on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Galactic archeology through Very Metal-Poor stars
item.description: Very Metal-Poor stara are very rare objects and they are key ingredients for the understanding of the formation of the Milky Way, offering a unique perspective into the earliest phases of our infant Galaxy.
